super_attack.name: Impulse Rush
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes colossal damage to enemy; Raises chance of evading enemy's attack; (including Super Attack) & chance of; performing a critical hit by 6% for 1 turn

passive_skill.name: Challenge Not to Be Missed
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +6 and ATK & DEF 200% up; (Forever) Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack; When receiving an attack for the 1st time within the turn: Evades enemy's attack; Before receiving an attack within the turn: Damage reduction rate 20% up; After evading an attack: ATK & DEF 120% up, launches an additional Super Attack and damage reduction rate 40% up for 6 turns; For every attack performed: (Forever) Ki +2 (up to +6); (Forever) ATK & DEF 40% up (up to 120%); 23 Ki Spheres obtained: Evades enemy's attack; (Once) Changes Ki Spheres: All to PHY
